<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 195 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Cathartic Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=97)

**Prerequisites**
[Cathartic Mage Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2963)

</column>

---

You gain the [basic spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=170). Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from this archetype, add a spell of that spell level from your chosen tradition to your repertoire—either a common spell or another spell you've learned or discovered.
